value.description: Identifies the error option to be applied.

key.description: Indicates the value associated with the key.

items.description: List of parameters which indicates the properties of the alert message.

message.description:
Indicates the description of API error alert message.
Example: Requested user is not authorized to perform the operation.

description: Indicates error alert when suspicious files, potential exploits and viruses found while scanning files , directories and user accounts. This includes code, message and parameter
